name: Google Takeout
notes: Comprehensive tool for most Google services (Gmail, Drive, Photos, etc.).

name: Facebook
notes: 'Download Your Information' tool for posts, photos, messages, and more.

name: Twitter (X)
notes: Archive includes tweets, DMs, media, and follower lists.

name: Instagram
notes: Request your data via settings. Includes photos, videos, and comments.

name: LinkedIn
notes: Offers multiple archives: connections, messages, job applications, etc.

name: GitHub
notes: Account data download is available. For repositories, use standard Git clone.

name: Spotify
notes: Includes personal data and streaming history. Can take up to 30 days.

name: Reddit
notes: Includes posts, comments, messages, and saved content.

name: Netflix
notes: Download viewing history, interaction data, and payment information.

name: Twitch
notes: Request your data from privacy settings. May take several days for large archives.

name: Discord
notes: Request all your data via User Settings > Privacy & Safety.

name: Microsoft Account
notes: Download data across Outlook, Xbox, search history, Edge, etc.

name: Amazon
notes: Request data like orders, payment history, and interactions.

name: Apple (Privacy Portal)
notes: Comprehensive request for data across iCloud, Apple ID, App Store, etc.

name: Adobe
notes: Request a copy of personal data, product usage data, and content.

name: Zoom
notes: Request a copy of your meeting logs, chat history, and account activity.

name: Slack
notes: Workspace owners can export all data. Individuals can export DM history.

name: TikTok
notes: Download includes profile info, activity, and app settings.

name: Pinterest
notes: Request your data, which includes your pins, boards, and account history.

name: Dropbox
notes: Download all files easily. Account information can be requested separately.

name: Steam
notes: Request data from Steam Support. Can take up to 30 days.

name: PayPal
notes: Request reports of your transaction history and other account data.

name: Notion
notes: Workspace owners can export the entire workspace. Also per-page exports.

name: Trello
notes: Board data can be exported in JSON format from the board menu.

name: Telegram
notes: Data export is only available through the Telegram Desktop application.

name: WhatsApp
notes: Request account info report in app settings. Does not include messages, which can be exported per-chat.

name: Figma
notes: Export entire design files (.fig) or export individual frames/assets to various image formats directly from the editor.

name: Canva
notes: Designs are exported individually from the editor. No single account data dump is available, but all creations can be downloaded.

name: Vercel
notes: Export personal account data and team data. Source code is managed via Git.

name: Netlify
notes: Request personal data from user settings. Site deploys can be downloaded as ZIP files.

name: DigitalOcean
notes: Most data is managed via API (droplets, volumes). Personal account information can be requested via support ticket.

name: Etsy
notes: Download your data, including order history and favorites, from your account's Privacy settings.

name: Bandcamp
notes: All purchases can be re-downloaded at any time from your collection page in various high-quality audio formats.
